page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: { Family size in our area ranges from small to very large. We believe that the average size family is 5 including parents. Most families live in farm houses or farm cottages although not all familes are associated with farm work as in the past. In the Muir of Fowlis area there are many new houses. Living in the country is becoming less popular for economic reasons e.g. the rising cost of travel. Approximately 59 people live in the village of Muir of Fowlis but a greater number of people live in isolated outlying areas. Most people have to travel for amenities - shopping, dentist etc., either to Alford (5 miles) or Aberdeen (25 miles). Most families have a car and a large percentage have more than one. Most women in the area can drive.
